attributes.action: CALL UPON THE UN TO INTERVENE & PREVENT GENOCIDE IN INDIAN OCCUPIED KASHMIR.
attributes.additional_details:
The rhetoric of the governing BJP has bolstered Extremism. 
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-48278441.
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-48755554.
Seeking Freedom for Kashmiris has been moral obligation on the British government since partition of India ,and we seek the government to call on the UN to intervene in Jammu Kashmir swiftly using ALL available legal means to prevent genocide, and immediately oversee a UN mandated plebiscite in the ENTIRE disputed region.
attributes.background:
The end of the 20th century witnessed genocide of Bosnian Muslims. The  21st century is about to witness ethnic cleansing and annihilation of Kashmiris in Jammu Kashmir by the extreme Hindutva ideology of BJP.
 https://tribune.com.pk/story/2039459/1-genocide-alert-issued-occupied-kashmir/?amp=1
